quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.

quotes.quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, through the ups and downs.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'You too? I thought I was the only one!'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.

quotes.quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success.

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy.

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

quotes.quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.

quotes.quote: The only thing that I know is that I know nothing.

quotes.quote: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.

quotes.quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy, it's just that the floor hates me, the table and chairs are bullies, and the walls get in my way.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.

quotes.quote: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She hugged me.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't suffer from insanity. I enjoy every minute of it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I don't need a parachute. If I fall, I'll just land on my awesomeness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I used to be indecisive. Now I'm not sure.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not crazy, my reality is just different than yours.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not short, I'm concentrated awesome.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.

quotes.quote: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.

quotes.quote: Confidence is like a muscle. The more you use it, the stronger it gets.

quotes.quote: Confidence is not about being perfect. It is about being yourself.

quotes.quote: You are enough just as you are.

quotes.quote: Be proud of who you are, and not ashamed of how someone else sees you.

quotes.quote: Self-love is the greatest medicine.

quotes.quote: You are beautiful, you are worthy, and you are enough.

quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It hurts to breathe because every breath I take proves I can't live without you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the person you want the most is the person you're best without.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I wish I were a little girl again because skinned knees are easier to fix than a broken heart.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don't.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
quotes.author: J.S.B. Morse

quotes.quote: A broken heart is the worst. It's like having broken ribs. Nobody can see it, but it hurts every time you breathe.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes, all you can do is lie in bed and hope to fall asleep before you fall apart.
quotes.author: William C. Hannan

quotes.quote: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
quotes.author: Eleanor Brownn

quotes.quote: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: You are worthy of the love and care you give to others.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Taking care of yourself is part of taking care of others.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Nourishing yourself in a way that helps you blossom in the direction you want to go is attainable, and you are worth the effort.
quotes.author: Deborah Day

quotes.quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
quotes.author: Lalah Delia

quotes.quote: You owe yourself the love that you so freely give to other people.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Self-care is a divine responsibility.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Taking care of myself doesn't mean 'me first,' it means 'me, too.'
quotes.author: L.R. Knost

quotes.quote: Your mindset determines your reality.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Creativity takes courage.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Creativity is contagious. Pass it on.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The creative adult is the child who survived.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious, and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't try to do things. You simply must do things.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
quotes.author: William Plomer

quotes.quote: To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough that you want to enhance its beauty, you want to bring a little more music to it, a little more poetry to it, a little more dance to it.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Creativity is the greatest rebellion in existence.
quotes.author: Osho
